mapper.select: select Plan_ID planID, Member_ID memberID, Plan_Title planTitle, Plan_StartDate planStartDate, Plan_EndDate planEndDate, Plan_EndChk planEndChk from tripster.tbl_Plan where tripster.tbl_Plan.Plan_ID in ( SELECT Plan_ID FROM tripster.tbl_Contents a join tripster.tbl_Plan_Detail b on a.Contents_ID = b.Contents_ID where a.Contents_Country = #{countryISO2} group by Plan_ID)
